abstract.t: The so called network discovery and selection problem affects network access, particularly in the presence of multiple available wireless accesses and roaming. This problem has been the subject of discussions in various standards bodies. This document summarizes the discussion held about this problem in the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) working group at the IETF. The problem is defined and divided into subproblems, and some constraints for possible solutions are outlined. The document also provides a discussion of the limitations of certain classes of solution, including some that have been previously defined.
